import React, { Component } from "react"; import { MDBCarousel, MDBCarouselCaption, MDBCarouselInner, MDBCarouselItem, MDBView, MDBMask, MDBContainer, MDBBtn, MDBIcon, } from "mdbreact"; import { getAideFromDB } from "../actions/aideActionCreator"; import { getUser } from "../actions/auth"; import Navbar from "./navbar"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; /******************************************************** ******/ export class Accueil extends Component { state = { jour: "", }; componentDidMount() { this.props.getAideFromDB(); this.props.getUser(); } /************************************************************ */ render() { //console.log("taw", this.props.user); return (
{/**** * *****carousel *********/}

{this.props.aides .filter((jr) => this.state.jour === "" ? jr : jr === this.state.jour ) .map((el) => (


{el.nom}

{el.ville}

Réserver
))}
); } } const mapStateToProps = (state) => { return { aides: state.aides, user: state.auth.user, }; }; export default connect(mapStateToProps, { getAideFromDB, getUser })(Accueil);
